event.title: Software Freedom Day 2024 in Berlin, Deutschland

body.p: Software Freedom Day (SFD) is a worldwide celebration of Free and Open Source Software. In Berlin the local group of the FSFE will celebrate together with the LUG "Linux Works" at the Kieztreff Undine at 21.09.2024 with a informative program of presentations about what is Free Software. Between 14h and 17h on Saturday. You can find the Kieztreff Undine at Hagenstra√üe 57 next to U+S Station Lichtenberg. Entrance is free.

Planned program: Erika Piric "What is Free Software" (EN), Tobias Diekershoff "How to run an NGO on Free Software" (EN or DE), DxU "Introduction to Logseq, the flexible note taking app" (DE). In addion there will be information about the social network Fediverse as alternative to X, Instagram and TikTok.
